title: Ticks Stream (request)
description: Initiate a continuous stream of spot price updates for a given symbol.

ticks.description: The short symbol name or array of symbols (obtained from `active_symbols` call).

subscribe.description: [Optional] If set to 1, will send updates whenever a new tick is received.

passthrough.description: [Optional] Used to pass data through the websocket, which may be retrieved via the `echo_req` output field.

req_id.description: [Optional] Used to map request to response.
